name: XPRMNTL Dashboard
description: This dashboard handles managment of Experiment configuration

BASE_URL.description: This url is the root of your application. It is used for OAuth on the server and the <base> tag on the client. If you want to do this quickly, please set your "App Name" above and use "http://<appname>.herokuapp.com" (no trailing slash). You can change it later.

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: The OAuth ClientID obtained from github.com. When it asks for your homepage URL, use the `BASE_URL` above. Authorization callback URL is your `BASE_URL`+ "/auth/github/callback"

GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The OAuth Client secret obtained from github.com

GITHUB_ORGS.description: A comma-separated (no spaces) list of Github Organizations from which to pull repos for experiments
